column1: #Text=Aang says : " I 'm sure it will be here any second !
#Text=" Katara says : " I wanted to make sure you were safe .
#Text=" Aang says : " Back there you acted like you did n't care .
#Text=I did let all that attention go to my head .
#Text=" Katara says : " Well , get out of the water before you catch a cold , you big jerk !
#Text=" Zuko says : " I want the Avatar alive .
